snippet: Cultural preservation groups have written to President Obama, asking that he make sure any military action taken in Syria is mindful of the need to protect important heritage sites.
abstract: Cultural preservation groups have written to President Obama, asking that he make sure any military action taken in Syria is mindful of the need to protect important heritage sites.

headline.main: Cultural Preservation Groups Ask Obama to Protect Syrian Heritage Sites
headline.print_headline: Obama Asked to Protect Syrian Heritage Sites
